00051 SHModelEstimator::SHModelEstimator(const std::string &signalFileName, const std::string &directionsFileName, const std::string &maskFileName, unsigned int order, Real lambda, char displayMode)
00052 {
00053     m_directions = 0;
00054     m_Y          = 0;
00055     m_L          = 0;
00056     m_Omega      = 0;
00057 
00058     m_order  = order;
00059     m_R      = 0.5 * (m_order+1) * (m_order+2);
00060     m_lambda = lambda;
00061 
00062     m_2PI = 2. * M_PI;
00063 
00064     this->readFiles(signalFileName, directionsFileName, maskFileName);
00065 
00066     m_displayMode = displayMode;
00067 }
00068 
00069 SHModelEstimator::SHModelEstimator(Sequence::Pointer signal, std::vector<Direction> *directions, Mask::Pointer mask, unsigned int order, Real lambda, char displayMode)
00070 {
00071     m_directions = directions;
00072     m_signal     = signal;
00073     m_mask       = mask;
00074     m_Y          = 0;
00075     m_L          = 0;
00076     m_Omega      = 0;
00077 
00078     m_order  = order;
00079     m_R      = 0.5 * (m_order+1) * (m_order+2);
00080     m_lambda = lambda;
00081 
00082     m_2PI = 2. * M_PI;
00083 
00084     m_displayMode = displayMode;
00085 }
00086 
00087 SHModelEstimator::~SHModelEstimator()
00088 {
00089     delete m_Y;
00090     delete m_L;
00091     delete m_Omega;
00092 }
00093 
00094 void SHModelEstimator::estimate()
00095 {
00096     SequenceRegion signalRegion = m_signal->GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00097     MaskRegion maskRegion       = m_mask->GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00098 
00099 
00100     Display1(m_displayMode, std::cout << "Estimating model..." << std::endl);
00101 
00102 
00103     //
00104     // Verify data
00105     //
00106 
00107         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tVerifying data..." << std::endl);
00108 
00109         if(m_directions->size() != signalRegion.GetSize(3)) // there is a problem
00110         {
00111             std::cerr << "Error: ";
00112             std::cerr << "There are " << m_directions->size() << " gradient directions and ";
00113             std::cerr << signalRegion.GetSize(3) << " gradient images !" << std::endl;
00114             exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00115         }
00116 
00117         if(signalRegion.GetSize(0) != maskRegion.GetSize(0) &&
00118            signalRegion.GetSize(1) != maskRegion.GetSize(1) &&
00119            signalRegion.GetSize(2) != maskRegion.GetSize(2))
00120         {
00121             std::cerr << "Error: bad data !" << std::endl;
00122             std::cerr << "Data image is of size ";
00123             std::cerr << signalRegion.GetSize(0) << "x" << signalRegion.GetSize(1) << "x" << signalRegion.GetSize(2);
00124             std::cerr << " and image mask is of size ";
00125             std::cerr << maskRegion.GetSize(0) << "x" << maskRegion.GetSize(1) << "x" << maskRegion.GetSize(2);
00126             std::cerr << "!" << std::endl;
00127             exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00128         }
00129 
00130         if(m_R <= 0) // bad order
00131         {
00132             std::cerr << "Error: ";
00133             std::cerr << "Bad order (1/2 * (order+1) * (order+2) = " << m_R << " <= 0) !" << std::endl;
00134             exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00135         }
00136 
00137         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\t\tThere are " << m_directions->size() << " gradient directions and images." << std::endl);
00138         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tdone." << std::endl);
00139 
00140 
00141     //
00142     // Allocate memory for image
00143     //
00144 
00145         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tAllocating memory space for model image..." << std::flush);
00146 
00147         m_model = Sequence::New();
00148 
00149         Sequence::SizeType modelSize;
00150         modelSize[0] = signalRegion.GetSize(0); modelSize[1] = signalRegion.GetSize(1);
00151         modelSize[2] = signalRegion.GetSize(2); modelSize[3] = m_R;
00152         m_model->SetRegions(modelSize);
00153 
00154         Sequence::SpacingType spacing = m_signal->GetSpacing();
00155         m_model->SetSpacing(spacing);
00156 
00157         Sequence::PointType origin = m_signal->GetOrigin();
00158         m_model->SetOrigin(origin);
00159 
00160         m_model->SetDirection(m_signal->GetDirection());
00161 
00162         m_model->Allocate();
00163         m_model->FillBuffer(0);
00164 
00165         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00166 
00167 
00168     //
00169     //  Compute needed matricies
00170     //
00171 
00172         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tComputing needed matrices..." << std::endl);
00173 
00174         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\t\tSpherical harmonics basis matrix..." << std::flush);
00175         this->computeSHBasisMatrix();
00176         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00177 
00178         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\t\tLaplace-Beltrami smoothing matrix..." << std::flush);
00179         this->computeLaplaceBeltramiMatrix();
00180         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00181 
00182         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\t\tTransition matrix..." << std::flush);
00183         this->computeOmegaMatrix();
00184         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00185 
00186         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tdone." << std::endl);
00187 
00188 
00189     //
00190     //  Compute model image
00191     //
00192 
00193         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tComputing model..." << std::flush);
00194 
00195         unsigned int xMax = signalRegion.GetSize(0);
00196         unsigned int yMax = signalRegion.GetSize(1);
00197         unsigned int zMax = signalRegion.GetSize(2);
00198 
00199         Sequence::SizeType signalSize;
00200         Sequence::IndexType signalIndex;
00201         Sequence::IndexType modelIndex;
00202 
00203         SequenceRegion modelRegion;
00204 
00205         Matrix &Omega = *m_Omega;
00206 
00207         for(unsigned int z=0; z<zMax; z++)
00208         {
00209             for(unsigned int x=0; x<xMax; x++)
00210             {
00211                 for(unsigned int y=0; y<yMax; y++)
00212                 {
00213                     Mask::IndexType mindex;
00214                     mindex[0] = x; mindex[1] = y; mindex[2] = z;
00215 
00216                     if(m_mask->GetPixel(mindex) == 1) // is in mask
00217                     {
00218                         // Define region for signal
00219                         signalIndex[0] = x; signalIndex[1] = y;
00220                         signalIndex[2] = z; signalIndex[3] = 0;
00221                         signalRegion.SetIndex(signalIndex);
00222 
00223                         signalSize[0] = 1; signalSize[1] = 1;
00224                         signalSize[2] = 1; signalSize[3] = m_directions->size();
00225                         signalRegion.SetSize(signalSize);
00226 
00227                         SequenceIterator signalIt(m_signal, signalRegion);
00228 
00229 
00230                         // Define region for model
00231                         modelIndex[0] = x; modelIndex[1] = y;
00232                         modelIndex[2] = z; modelIndex[3] = 0;
00233                         modelRegion.SetIndex(modelIndex);
00234 
00235                         modelSize[0] = 1; modelSize[1] = 1;
00236                         modelSize[2] = 1; modelSize[3] = m_R;
00237                         modelRegion.SetSize(modelSize);
00238 
00239                         SequenceIterator modelIt(m_model, modelRegion);
00240 
00241 
00242                         // Get S_p matrix
00243                         Matrix Sp(m_directions->size(), 1);
00244                         unsigned int i = 0;
00245 
00246                         for(signalIt.GoToBegin(); !signalIt.IsAtEnd(); ++signalIt)
00247                             Sp(i++,0) = signalIt.Get();
00248 
00249 
00250                         // Compute C_p matrix
00251                         Matrix Cp(m_R, 1);
00252 
00253                         Cp = Omega * Sp;
00254 
00255 
00256                         // Set model image
00257                         i = 0;
00258 
00259                         for(modelIt.GoToBegin(); !modelIt.IsAtEnd(); ++modelIt)
00260                             modelIt.Set(Cp(i++,0));
00261                     } // if in mask
00262                 } // for y
00263             } // for x
00264         } // for z
00265 
00266         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00267 
00268 
00269     Display1(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00270 }
00271 
00272 void SHModelEstimator::save()
00273 {
00274     Display1(m_displayMode, std::cout << "Saving data..." << std::endl);
00275 
00276     //
00277     // Model file
00278     //
00279 
00280         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tmodel into file \"model.nii.gz\"..." << std::flush);
00281 
00282         SequenceWriter::Pointer writer = SequenceWriter::New();
00283 
00284         writer->SetFileName("model.nii.gz");
00285         writer->SetInput(m_model);
00286 
00287         try
00288         {
00289             writer->Update();
00290             Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00291         }
00292         catch(itk::ImageFileWriterException &err)
00293         {
00294             std::cout << "Error: " << std::endl;
00295             std::cout << err << std::endl;
00296         }
00297 
00298 
00299     Display1(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00300 
00301 //    delete m_directions;
00302 }
00303 
00304 Sequence::Pointer SHModelEstimator::GetModel()
00305 {
00306     return m_model;
00307 }
00308 
00309 void SHModelEstimator::readFiles(const std::string &signalFileName, const std::string &directionsFileName, const std::string &maskFileName)
00310 {
00311     assert(!directionsFileName.empty());
00312     assert(!signalFileName.empty());
00313 
00314 
00315     Display1(m_displayMode, std::cout << "Reading data files..." << std::endl);
00316 
00317 
00318     //
00319     // Reading signal
00320     //
00321 
00322         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tReading signal image..." << std::flush);
00323 
00324         SequenceReader::Pointer reader = SequenceReader::New();
00325         reader->SetFileName(signalFileName);
00326         reader->Update();               // reading file
00327         m_signal = reader->GetOutput(); // getting data
00328 
00329         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00330 
00331 
00332     //
00333     // Reading image mask
00334     //
00335 
00336         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tReading image mask..." << std::flush);
00337 
00338         MaskReader::Pointer mreader = MaskReader::New();
00339         mreader->SetFileName(maskFileName);
00340         mreader->Update();
00341         m_mask = mreader->GetOutput();
00342 
00343         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00344 
00345 
00346     //
00347     // Reading gradients directions file
00348     //
00349 
00350         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tReading gradient directions..." << std::flush);
00351 
00352         // Open file
00353         std::fstream directionsFile(directionsFileName.c_str(), std::fstream::in);
00354 
00355         if(!directionsFile.is_open())  // Unable to open file
00356         {
00357             std::cout << "Error: unable to read gradient directions file !" << std::endl;
00358             exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00359         }
00360         else                           // File is open
00361         {
00362             m_directions = new std::vector<Direction>;
00363 
00364             Real theta = 0;
00365             Real phi   = 0;
00366 
00367             while((directionsFile >> theta) && (directionsFile >> phi))
00368                 m_directions->push_back(Direction(theta,phi));
00369         }
00370 
00371         // Close file
00372         directionsFile.close();
00373 
00374         Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00375 
00376 
00377     Display1(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00378 }
00379 
00380 void SHModelEstimator::computeSHBasisMatrix()
00381 {
00382     assert(m_directions);
00383     assert(!m_Y);
00384 
00385     // Allocate memory space for Y matrix
00386     m_Y = new Matrix(m_directions->size(), m_R);
00387 
00388     Matrix &Y = *m_Y;
00389 
00390     // Compute Y matrix
00391     Real _4PI  = 4.0 * M_PI;
00392 
00393 
00394     for(unsigned int u=0; u<m_directions->size(); u++)
00395     {
00396         unsigned int j = 0;
00397 
00398         for(unsigned int l=0; l<=m_order; l+=2)
00399         {
00400             Real coef = std::sqrt((2.0*(Real)l + 1.0) / _4PI);
00401 
00402             for(int m=-(int)l; m<=(int)l; m++)
00403                 Y(u,j++) = coef * SphericalHarmonics::computeBasis(m_directions->at(u), l, m);
00404         } // for l
00405     } // for u
00406 
00407     #ifndef NDEBUG
00408         std::cerr << "Y (" << Y.Rows() << "x" << Y.Cols() << ")" << std::endl;
00409         Y.GetVnlMatrix().print(std::cerr);
00410         std::cerr << std::endl;
00411     #endif // NDEBUG
00412 }
00413 
00414 void SHModelEstimator::computeLaplaceBeltramiMatrix()
00415 {
00416     assert(!m_L);
00417 
00418     m_L = new Matrix(m_R, m_R);
00419 
00420     Matrix &L = *m_L;
00421 
00422     L.Fill(0);
00423 
00424     unsigned int i = 0;
00425 
00426     for(unsigned int l=0; l<=m_order; l+=2)
00427     {
00428         Real lp1   = l+1;
00429         Real value = l*l * lp1*lp1;
00430 
00431         for(int m=-(int)l; m<=(int)l; m++)
00432         {
00433             L(i,i) = value;
00434             i++;
00435         } // for m
00436     } // for l
00437 
00438     #ifndef NDEBUG
00439         std::cerr << "L (" << L.Rows() << "x" << L.Cols() << ")" << std::endl;
00440         L.GetVnlMatrix().print(std::cerr);
00441         std::cerr << std::endl;
00442     #endif // NDEBUG
00443 }
00444 
00445 void SHModelEstimator::computeOmegaMatrix()
00446 {
00447     assert(m_directions);
00448     assert(m_Y);
00449     assert(m_L);
00450     assert(!m_Omega);
00451 
00452     // Allocate memory space for Omega matrix
00453     m_Omega = new Matrix(m_R, m_directions->size());
00454 
00455     Matrix &Omega = *m_Omega;
00456 
00457     // Get needed matrices
00458     vnl_matrix<Real> tmp;
00459     Matrix &Y = *m_Y;
00460     Matrix &L = *m_L;
00461     Matrix Yt;
00462     Matrix YtY;
00463     Matrix YtYplL;
00464     Matrix YtYplLInverted;
00465 
00466     // Get Y transpose
00467     tmp = Y.GetTranspose();
00468     Yt  = tmp;
00469 
00470     // Get YtY
00471     YtY = Yt * Y;
00472 
00473     // Get YtY + lL
00474     L     *= m_lambda;
00475     YtYplL = YtY + L;
00476 
00477     // Get (YtYplL)^-1
00478     tmp            = YtYplL.GetInverse();
00479     YtYplLInverted = tmp;
00480 
00481     #ifndef NDEBUG
00482         std::cerr << "Yt (" << Yt.Rows() << "x" << Yt.Cols() << ")" << std::endl;
00483         Yt.GetVnlMatrix().print(std::cerr);
00484         std::cerr << std::endl;
00485 
00486         std::cerr << "YtY (" << YtY.Rows() << "x" << YtY.Cols() << ")" << std::endl;
00487         YtY.GetVnlMatrix().print(std::cerr);
00488         std::cerr << std::endl;
00489 
00490         std::cerr << "YtYplL (" << YtYplL.Rows() << "x" << YtYplL.Cols() << ")" << std::endl;
00491         YtYplL.GetVnlMatrix().print(std::cerr);
00492         std::cerr << std::endl;
00493 
00494         std::cerr << "YtYplLInverted (" << YtYplLInverted.Rows() << "x" << YtYplLInverted.Cols() << ")" << std::endl;
00495         YtYplLInverted.GetVnlMatrix().print(std::cerr);
00496         std::cerr << std::endl;
00497     #endif // NDEBUG
00498 
00499     // Compute Omega
00500     // Omega = (Yt * Y + l*L)^-1 * Yt
00501     Omega = YtYplLInverted * Yt;
00502 
00503     #ifndef NDEBUG
00504         std::cerr << "Omega (" << Omega.Rows() << "x" << Omega.Cols() << ")" << std::endl;
00505         Omega.GetVnlMatrix().print(std::cerr);
00506         std::cerr << std::endl;
00507     #endif // NDEBUG
00508 }
